ai-patthana14.8:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma ladies that are difficult for the living, etc.,
ai-patthana14.8:1.1_0: Not this teaching has cause, this is not the reason for the sake of this,
ai-patthana14.8:1.1_1: Enjoying this teaching doesn’t give rise to the cause of causes.
ai-patthana14.8:1.1_2: Thoughts that are invited to the teaching, and there are no cause or condition for the sake of this.
ai-patthana14.8:1.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana14.8:2.1_0: And the causes, three, four, five hundred, three, ten, twenty, thirty, forty, fifty, a hundred, a thousand, or a hundred thousand objects.
